results.title: Metformin Inhibits Propofol-Induced Apoptosis of Mouse Hippocampal Neurons HT-22 Through Downregulating Cav-1
results.text_hl: Then, we found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protects @CHEMICAL_Propofol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015742 @@@propofol@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@ via downregulating @GENE_CAV1 @GENE_12389 @@@Cav-1@@@.

results.title: Regulation of the apoptosis/autophagy switch by propionic acid in ventromedial hypothalamus of rats with type 2 diabetes mellitus
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@, however, caused reactive @DISEASE_Gliosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005911 @@@astrogliosis@@@ and accumulation of @CHEMICAL_Lipofuscin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008062 @@@lipofuscin@@@ granules.

results.title: Metformin inhibits mitochondrial dysfunction and apoptosis in cardiomyocytes induced by high glucose via upregulating AMPK activity.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibits @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@ in cardiomyocytes induced by high @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ via upregulating @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activity.

results.title: Metformin protects cardiomyocytes against oxygen-glucose deprivation injury by promoting autophagic flux through AMPK pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ increased cell viability and inhibited OGD-induced LDH synthesis and cell @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@.

results.title: Metformin attenuates cadmium-induced neuronal apoptosis in vitro via blocking ROS-dependent PP5/AMPK-JNK signaling pathway.

results.title: Cardioprotective effects of melatonin and metformin against doxorubicin-induced cardiotoxicity in rats are through preserving mitochondrial function and dynamics.
results.text_hl: Treatment with either @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exerted equal measures of cardioprotection via reducing oxidative stress, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, autophagy, @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@, and improved mitochondrial function, dynamics balance, biogenesis, and bioenergetics in the @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@Dox@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Arinno A, Maneechote C, Khuanjing T, Ongnok B, Prathumsap N, Chunchai T, Arunsak B, Kerdphoo S, Shinlapawittayatorn K, Chattipakorn SC, Chattipakorn N. results.title: Metformin alleviates ethanol-induced cardiomyocyte injury by activating AKT/Nrf2 signaling in an ErbB2-dependent manner.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@cardiomyocyte apoptosis@@@ and reduced the expressions of apoptosis-related proteins (@GENE_BAX @GENE_581 @@@Bax@@@ and C-@GENE_EFS @GENE_10278 @@@CAS-3@@@).

results.title: A review on role of metformin as a potential drug for epilepsy treatment and modulation of epileptogenesis.
results.text_hl: The suggested mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ relevant to epileptogenesis modulation mainly encompass @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation, @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ inhibition, protection against blood-brain-barrier disruption, inhibition of @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@, and reduction of oxidative stress.

results.title: Metformin prevents morphine-induced apoptosis in rats with diabetic neuropathy: a possible mechanism for attenuating morphine tolerance.
results.text_hl: In this study, our aim was to investigate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Morphine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009020 @@@morphine@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@neuronal apoptosis@@@ and antinociceptive tolerance in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Metformin reverses oxidative stress-induced mitochondrial dysfunction in pre-osteoblasts via the EGFR/GSK-3beta/calcium pathway
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibited mitochondrial permeability transition pore opening, suppressed the cytoplasmic @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ influx and reversed pre-osteoblast @<m>DISEASE_Malformations_of_Cortical_Development_Group_I</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065703 @@@apoptosis@@@ by promoting @GENE_GSK3B @GENE_2932 @@@GSK-3beta@@@ phosphorylation.
